fishes.info: Bottomfish fishing operations, typically using weighted lines and baited hooks, do not have adverse impacts to the habitat.
fishes.name: Crimson Jobfish

fishes.info: Area closures and gear restrictions protect habitats that are affected by some kinds of trawl gear.
fishes.name: White Hake

fishes.info: Area closures and gear restrictions protect habitat that are affected by some types of trawl gear.
fishes.name: Atlantic Chub Mackerel

fishes.info: Fishing gears used to harvest shortfin squid have minimal impacts on habitat.
fishes.name: Shortfin Squid

fishes.info: Fishing gears used to harvest American lobster have minimal impacts on habitat.
fishes.name: American Lobster

fishes.info: Most fishing gear used to harvest yellowtail rockfish rarely contacts the ocean floor and has minimal impacts on habitat. Area closures and gear restrictions protect sensitive rocky, cold-water coral and sponge habitats from bottom trawl gear.
fishes.name: Yellowtail Rockfish

fishes.info: Area closures and gear restrictions protect sensitive rocky, cold-water coral and sponge habitats from bottom trawl gear.
fishes.name: Bocaccio
